member.name: ISyncMgrConflictResolutionItems.GetCount
member.param: A pointer to an item count.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrConflictResolutionItems.GetItem
member.summary: Gets result information for a specified item, when successful.
member.param: On success, contains a pointer to a structure.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrConflictResolutionItems
member.summary: Exposes methods that get item info and item count.
